titles.title: Fairness in Nursing Home Arbitration Act
Fairness in Nursing Home Arbitration Act

A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit skilled nursing facilities and nursing facilities from using pre-dispute arbitration agreements with respect to residents of those facilities under the Medicare and Medicaid programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Fairness in Nursing Home Arbitration Act
This bill prohibits, and nullifies any existing, pre-dispute arbitration agreements with respect to Medicare skilled nursing facilities or Medicaid nursing facilities, home- and community-based services, or home health care services.
